import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './retailclick.style.css'; class retailclick extends Component { render() { return (

FEATURES

Billing

Sales, Multiple Payment mode, Sales Return, Sales Order, Delivery Challan, Home Delivery, Estimate,Balance

Inventory

Purchase, Purchase Return, Stock Analysis, Stock Counting and adjustment etc.

Barcoding

Cash and Check Payment, Supplier Outstanding, Suplier Ledger, Purchasewise Sale, Payment Due etc.

Accounting

Balance Sheet, Profit and Loss Account, Voucher and Joural Entry, General Ledger etc.

WHAT IS RETAIL-CLICK ?

Retailing has now become a science of selling smartly. To make this science happen in your shop, adapt to new challenges of fashion, control overstocking, satisfy customers by giving complete range of stock with good schemes and value added service, use RETAIL-CLICK!

"RETAIL-CLICK"’ is a software for Retail Management. This software takes complete care of inventory system of Retail shops where every item can be barcoded piece to piece. It is being used by more than 500 retail outlets across India.

); } } export default retailclick;
